item.description:
Lindsey and Alex Cyr adopted their three rescue Pugs, Roger, Sylvia, and Carmel from Green Mountain Pug Rescue in Vermont about two months ago. Now the girls are celebrating their first birthday in their forever home, and mom is in charge of doing it up BIG...

There's going to be a Puggie cake made of animal treats for the dogs...
There's going to be a tray or two of homemade treats for the dogs...
There's going to be a sheet cake for people with Happy Birthday to me on it... yup, it's Mom's birthday too!
There's going to be soft drinks and lots of water...
There might be meatballs - still undecided about those... hmmmm....
Clovis sez, MEATBALLS! I WANT MEATBALLS!

All their Puggie friends are invited, even though they haven't met them yet! No Pug is a stranger to another Pug!

Be there, or be square!

group.name: The South of Boston Pug Meetup Group

item.name: A Birthday Bash for Sylvia and Carmel
